Operation 'createFligtOrders' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. The current summary contains a typo ('Fligtorders' should be 'FlightOrders') and is grammatically awkward. The description is completely empty, providing no guidance for AI agents on when/how to use this critical booking operation. The improved summary uses action-oriented language and clarifies the relationship between offers and orders. The description explains the operation's purpose, required inputs (authentication, passenger/contact/payment details), expected outputs (FlightOrder confirmation), and important side effects (payment processing, booking commitment). This enables AI agents to understand the operation's significance and prerequisites.

data.current_summary: Create Order associated to the Flight offers.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a flight booking order from selected offers
data.description_suggestion: Creates a confirmed flight booking order from one or more selected flight offers. Requires authenticated user credentials and a valid FlightOrder request containing passenger details, contact information, payment method, and selected flight offer references. Returns a FlightOrder object with confirmation details, order ID, and booking references. This operation commits the booking and may trigger payment processing. Supports multiple passengers and ancillary services configuration.
data.reasoning: The current summary contains a typo ('Fligtorders' should be 'FlightOrders') and is grammatically awkward. The description is completely empty, providing no guidance for AI agents on when/how to use this critical booking operation. The improved summary uses action-oriented language and clarifies the relationship between offers and orders. The description explains the operation's purpose, required inputs (authentication, passenger/contact/payment details), expected outputs (FlightOrder confirmation), and important side effects (payment processing, booking commitment). This enables AI agents to understand the operation's significance and prerequisites.

data.current_summary: Create Order associated to the Flight offers.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a flight booking order from selected offers
data.description_suggestion: Creates a confirmed flight booking order from one or more selected flight offers. Requires authenticated user credentials and a valid FlightOrder request containing passenger details, contact information, payment method, and selected flight offer references. Returns a FlightOrder object with confirmation details, order ID, and booking references. This operation commits the booking and may trigger payment processing. Supports multiple passengers and ancillary services configuration.
